fields.name: identifier
fields.description: An identifier from the third party for the authenticated user, such as the Facebook user number or the Salesforce user ID.

fields.name: firstName
fields.description: The first name of the authenticated user, according to the third party.

fields.name: lastName
fields.description: The last name of the authenticated user, according to the third party.

fields.name: fullName
fields.description: The full name of the authenticated user, according to the third party.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email address of the authenticated user, according to the third party.

fields.name: link
fields.description: A stable link for the authenticated user such as https://www.facebook.com/MyUsername.

fields.name: username
fields.description: The username of the authenticated user in the third party.

fields.name: locale
fields.description: The standard locale string for the authenticated user.

fields.name: provider
fields.description: The service used to log in, such as Facebook or Janrain.

fields.name: siteLoginUrl
fields.description: The site login page URL passed in if used with a site; null otherwise.

constructors.name: UserData
constructors.signature: public UserData(String identifier, String firstName, String lastName, String fullName, String email, String link, String userName, String locale, String provider, String siteLoginUrl, Map<String,String> attributeMap)
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the Auth.UserData class using the specified arguments.

params.name: attributeMap
params.description: An identifier from the third party for the authenticated user, such as the Facebook user number or the Salesforce user ID. The first name of the authenticated user, according to the third party. The last name of the authenticated user, according to the third party. The full name of the authenticated user, according to the third party. The email address of the authenticated user, according to the third party. A stable link for the authenticated user such as https://www.facebook.com/MyUsername. The username of the authenticated user in the third party. The standard locale string for the authenticated user. The service used to log in, such as Facebook or Janrain. The site login page URL passed in if used with a site; null otherwise. A map of data from the third party, in case the handler has to access non-standard values. For example, when using Janrain as a provider, the fields Janrain returns in its accessCredentials dictionary are placed into the attributeMap. These fields vary by provider.
